thread.title: Rohan Mehra's latest Twitter video raises serious doubts over 'Bigg Boss' voting | Zee News
thread.title_full: Rohan Mehra's latest Twitter video raises serious doubts over 'Bigg Boss' voting | Zee News

title: Rohan Mehra's latest Twitter video raises serious doubts over 'Bigg Boss' voting | Zee News
text:
Rohan Mehra's latest Twitter video raises serious doubts over 'Bigg Boss' voting By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 13:47 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Indian television star Rohan Mehra is apparently not amused by the makers of popular reality show 'Bigg Boss'. The 27-year-old actor posted a video on Twitter on Tuesday and it is raising serious doubts over the voting of the controversial reality series. 
In the short clip, a fan can be seen trying to vote for the 'Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai' hunk using his smartphone. Sadly, he fails repeatedly to register his vote due to unknown reasons. However, when he tries to vote for Bani J, it gets registered flawlessly. 
Bani and Rohan time and again locked horns on Salman Khan's program. Their rapport seems to have deteriorated even further after stepping out of 'Bigg Boss 10'. MUST READ
